etymologies: natural exclamation: first recorded in American English in the mid 19th century

definitions: used to express mild protest, entreaty, or sympathy
shortDefinitions: used to express mild protest, entreaty or disapproval

definitions: used to express mild disappointment or self-deprecation

examples.text: aw, it's a shame I can't make it
aww, thanks for the nice comments

shortDefinitions: used to express disappointment or self-deprecation

definitions: used to express pleasure, delight, or affection, especially in response to something regarded as sweet or endearing

examples.text: aww, the kitten is too cute!
aww, are you guys an item?

shortDefinitions: used to express pleasure, delight, or affection
